reason: Final build verification PASSED. All 3 build targets compile successfully (Server: PASS, Dashboard: PASS, VS Code Extension: PASS). Server smoke test passed. 1122/1122 tests passing. Recommend Archivist for plan archival.

data.build_instructions:
1. cd server && npm install && npx tsc
2. cd dashboard && npm install && npx vite build
3. cd vscode-extension && npm install && npx tsc
4. Run server: cd server && node dist/index.js
5. Run dashboard dev: cd dashboard && npm run dev
6. Run tests: cd server && npm test
optimization_suggestions: Dashboard JS bundle is 594.64 kB (>500 kB). Consider dynamic import() for code-splitting.
Use manualChunks in vite.config.ts for better chunking.
Consider incremental TypeScript compilation (composite: true) for faster rebuilds.
dependency_notes: All components compile without dependency errors.
No missing modules or dangling imports.
